channel.title: ODD run Error
channel.description: hey guys this has been bugging teh hell out of me lol, ive searched my npcspawns and i cant find where or what is wrong with this, any way i deleted the packed files after fixing my npc's spawn and ran the server to repack them, the weird thing is the one line i had in npcspawn that could of maybe made this error i deleted the first time i ran the server and got this error (like an hour ago rofl) here the error: [code=java][Launcher] Loading Elysian-spawn, please wait... [NPCSpawns] Packing npc spawns... ERROR! THREAD NAME: main java.lang.RuntimeException: Invalid NPC Spawn line: at com.rs.utils.NPCSpawns.packNPCSpawns(NPCSpawns.java:94) at com.rs.utils.NPCSpawns.init(NPCSpawns.java:77) at com.rs.Initializer.loadFiles(Initializer.java:49) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:42) [NPCCombatDefinitionsL] Packing npc combat definitions... [NPCBonuses] Packing npc bonuses... [Launcher] Server is now online. Took 14640 seconds to load.[/code] any ideas? (even if there is a certain kind of editing writing program i could download that you can search a specific line, cuz wordpads crap :)

item.title: ODD run Error
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

Thanks man ill try that

Read full topic

item.title: ODD run Error
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

You probably have an extra space or tab on an NPC spawn line.

Example:

548 - 2312 3561 _0
^
extra space

Just skim through and you’ll find it. As for a text editor for tasks such as this one, use notepad++. It’s a free open source notepad for programmers.

It also has features to find and replace letters and numbers(use CTRL + F). This feature can help you find the extra space or tab.

Read full topic
